result.eng: Is Irish difficult, in your opinion?
result.ga: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leat
result.orig: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leat
result.html: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leatIs Irish difficult, in your opinion?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil an Ġaeilge deacair dar leatIs Irish difficult, in your opinion?

result.eng: Do you use Irish in your daily life?
result.ga: An mbaineann tú úsáid as an Ghaeilge i do shaol laethúil
result.orig: An mbaineann tú úsáid as an Ghaeilge i do shaol laethúil
result.html: An mbaineann tú úsáid as an Ghaeilge i do shaol laethúilDo you use Irish in your daily life?
result.ponchtml: An mbaineann tú úsáid as an Ġaeilge i do ẛaol laeṫúilDo you use Irish in your daily life?

result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: The Irish language always has prirority.
result.ga: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaí
result.orig: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaí
result.html: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaíThe Irish language always has prirority.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ġaeilge i gcónaíThe Irish language always has prirority.

result.eng: What made you want to learn Irish?
result.ga: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ṫug ort an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?

result.eng: It is worthwhile to learn Irish.
result.ga: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimIt is worthwhile to learn Irish.
result.ponchtml: Is fiú an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimIt is worthwhile to learn Irish.

result.eng: She does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ga: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.orig: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.html: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ponchtml: Níl an Ġaeilge ar a coṁairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.

result.ga: Tá an Ghaeilge ar mo thoil agam
result.orig: Tá an Ghaeilge ar mo thoil agam
result.html: Tá an Ghaeilge ar mo thoil agamI speak Irish perfectly.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Ġaeilge ar mo ṫoil agamI speak Irish perfectly.

result.eng: The Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.
result.ga: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre
result.orig: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre
result.html: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíreThe Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Ġaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíreThe Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.

result.html: Tá an Ghaeilge éascaIrish is easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Ġaeilge éascaIrish is easy.
